name: sphere
description: Monolithic-first toolkit with codegen for contracts, errors, stubs, and clients

name: ChatGPT-Telegram-Workers
description: Easily deploy your Telegram ChatGPT bot on Cloudflare Workers (or Vercel, Docker...).

name: mcp-proxy
description: An MCP proxy server that aggregates and serves multiple MCP resource servers through a single HTTP server.

name: mail2telegram
description: Forward email to telegram with Cloudflare Email Routing

name: rmtrash
description: rmtrash is a small utility that will move the file to macOS's Trash rather than obliterating the file (as rm does).

name: github-backup
description: A simple tool to backup github repository to gitea or other provider.

name: shell-ask
description: Ask LLM directly from your terminal using a pure bash script

name: TrieRouter
description: A simple framework for application routing.

name: telegram-bot-api-types
description: This is a project of a type definition file for the Telegram Bot API that generates multilingual automatically.

name: github-status
description: Generate SVG cards showing your GitHub statistics and programming language distribution

name: gbvm
description: A command line tool to manage Go binaries installed in GOPATH/bin
